016package io.micronaut.maven.jib;
017
018import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.api.Credential;
019import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.maven.MavenProjectProperties;
020import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.plugins.common.PropertyNames;
021import org.apache.maven.model.Plugin;
022import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
023import org.codehaus.plexus.util.xml.Xpp3Dom;
024
025import javax.inject.Inject;
026import javax.inject.Singleton;
027import java.util.ArrayList;
028import java.util.Arrays;
029import java.util.Collections;
030import java.util.HashSet;
031import java.util.List;
032import java.util.Optional;
033import java.util.Set;
034import java.util.stream.Collectors;
035
036/**
037 * Exposes the Jib plugin configuration so that it can be read by other mojos.
038 *
039 * @author Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal
040 * @since 1.1
041 */
042@Singleton
043public class JibConfigurationService {
044
045    private static final String IMAGE = "image";
046    private static final String CONTAINER = "container";
047    private static final String WORKING_DIRECTORY = "workingDirectory";
048
049    private Xpp3Dom configuration;
050    private Xpp3Dom to;
051    private Xpp3Dom from;
052
053    @Inject
054    public JibConfigurationService(MavenProject mavenProject) {
055        final Plugin plugin = mavenProject.getPlugin(MavenProjectProperties.PLUGIN_KEY);
056        if (plugin != null && plugin.getConfiguration() != null) {
057            configuration = (Xpp3Dom) plugin.getConfiguration();
058            to = configuration.getChild("to");
059            from = configuration.getChild("from");
060        }
061    }
062
063    /**
064     * @return the <code>to.image</code> configuration.
065     */
066    public Optional<String> getToImage() {
067        Optional<String> result;
068        String propertyValue = System.getProperties().getProperty(PropertyNames.TO_IMAGE);
069        if (propertyValue != null) {
070            result = Optional.of(propertyValue);
071        } else if (to != null) {
072            result = Optional.ofNullable(to.getChild(IMAGE).getValue());
073        } else {
074            result = Optional.empty();
075        }
076        return result;
077    }
078
079    /**
080     * @return the <code>from.image</code> configuration.
081     */
082    public Optional<String> getFromImage() {
083        Optional<String> result;
084        String propertyValue = System.getProperties().getProperty(PropertyNames.FROM_IMAGE);
085        if (propertyValue != null) {
086            result = Optional.of(propertyValue);
087        } else if (from != null) {
088            result = Optional.ofNullable(from.getChild(IMAGE).getValue());
089        } else {
090            result = Optional.empty();
091        }
092        return result;
093    }
094
095    /**
096     * @return the <code>to.tags</code> configuration.
097     */
098    public Set<String> getTags() {
099        Set<String> result = null;
100        String propertyValue = System.getProperties().getProperty(PropertyNames.TO_TAGS);
101        if (propertyValue != null) {
102            result = new HashSet<>(parseCommaSeparatedList(propertyValue));
103        } else {
104            if (to != null) {
105                Xpp3Dom tags = to.getChild("tags");
106                if (tags != null && tags.getChildCount() > 0) {
107                    result = Arrays.stream(tags.getChildren())
108                        .map(Xpp3Dom::getValue)
109                        .collect(Collectors.toSet());
110                }
111            }
112            if (result == null) {
113                result = Collections.emptySet();
114            }
115        }
116        return result;
117    }
118
119    /**
120     * @return the <code>to.auth.username</code> and <code>to.auth.password</code> configuration.
121     */
122    public Optional<Credential> getToCredentials() {
123        return getCredentials(PropertyNames.TO_AUTH_USERNAME, PropertyNames.TO_AUTH_PASSWORD, to);
124    }
125
126    /**
127     * @return the <code>from.auth.username</code> and <code>from.auth.password</code> configuration.
128     */
129    public Optional<Credential> getFromCredentials() {
130        return getCredentials(PropertyNames.FROM_AUTH_USERNAME, PropertyNames.FROM_AUTH_PASSWORD, from);
131    }
132
133    private Optional<Credential> getCredentials(String usernamePropName, String passwordPropName, Xpp3Dom node) {
134        Optional<Credential> result = Optional.empty();
135        String usernameProp = System.getProperties().getProperty(usernamePropName);
136        String passwordProp = System.getProperties().getProperty(passwordPropName);
137        if (usernameProp != null && passwordProp != null) {
138            result = Optional.of(Credential.from(usernameProp, passwordProp));
139        } else {
140            if (node != null) {
141                Xpp3Dom auth = node.getChild("auth");
142                if (auth != null) {
143                    Xpp3Dom username = auth.getChild("username");
144                    Xpp3Dom password = auth.getChild("password");
145                    if (username != null && password != null) {
146                        result = Optional.of(Credential.from(username.getValue(), password.getValue()));
147                    }
148                }
149            }
150        }
151        return result;
152    }
153
154    /**
155     * @return the <code>container.workingDirectory</code> configuration.
156     */
157    public Optional<String> getWorkingDirectory() {
158        if (configuration != null) {
159            Xpp3Dom container = configuration.getChild(CONTAINER);
160            if (container != null && container.getChild(WORKING_DIRECTORY) != null) {
161                return Optional.ofNullable(container.getChild(WORKING_DIRECTORY).getValue());
162            }
163        }
164        return Optional.empty();
165    }
166
167    /**
168     * @return the <code>container.args</code> configuration.
169     */
170    public List<String> getArgs() {
171        var result = new ArrayList<String>();
172        if (configuration != null) {
173            Xpp3Dom container = configuration.getChild(CONTAINER);
174            if (container != null) {
175                Xpp3Dom args = container.getChild("args");
176                if (args.getChildCount() > 0) {
177                    for (Xpp3Dom arg : args.getChildren()) {
178                        result.add(arg.getValue());
179                    }
180                } else {
181                    result.add(args.getValue());
182                }
183            }
184        }
185        return result;
186    }
187
188    private static Set<String> parseCommaSeparatedList(String list) {
189        String[] parts = list.split(",");
190        var items = new HashSet<String>(parts.length);
191        for (String part : parts) {
192            items.add(part.trim());
193        }
194        return items;
195    }
196}
